name: Felbat

ability.name: Life Steal
ability.description: While fighting together, grants the player and Felbat the life steal effect which absorbs some of the received damage and restores HP.

description: Attacking from the shadows, this Pal traps its prey within its cloak-like wings. It's probably best not to know what happens within them, or why the inside of its wings are stained red.

skills.name: Poison Blast
skills.description: Hurls poison sludge at an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Ball
skills.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

skills.name: Shadow Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Spirit Flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: Nightmare Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Ignis Rage
skills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
